title: Promos for Silver but nothing happened?

embed.description: TerminalTortoise / Silver 5 26LP / 31W 30L Win Ratio 51% / Jinx - 38W 31L Win Ratio 55%, Ashe - 6W 3L Win Ratio 67%, Quinn - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%, Caitlyn - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Kindred - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%

body: I recently finished playing my promos in Flex Queue to Silver V from Bronze I and won 3 - 2. This was my second promotional series as I lost the previous one to Silver. Thus I was granted a free win. However, after finishing my game, the LoL client stated that I had just qualified for my series to Silver and I was back at 0 - 0. I was of course not too concerned, merely shrugging it off as a bug or glitch for the new client. I decided to play another Flex Queue Game to hopefully have LoL update me. I unfortunately lost the next game and in the game end screen received a loss for my promos. Now, I was slightly concerned that this perhaps was a major glitch, or I was just being incredibly stupid. After checking my profile again, I saw that I was now at Bronze 1 84 LP, after losing 16 points. I was now really confused. Wasn't I just in my promos? Should I be in Silver 5? Some assistance would be appreciated.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I'm not aware of any bugs or glitches, so I took a look at your case to see what's up.  You had a series yesterday where you were 2 wins and 2 losses.  It looks like your last match was a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which counts as an automatic loss, and ended your series.  It looks like you're back into a series now, so you'll have to win the next 3 games to get promoted.  Let me know if that clears things up, and good luck!

Thanks for the clarification. I do not particularly remember if I dodged queue or not, but if I did, I now understand what has happened. While I did not win my promos, I am sure I will advance soon. Once again, thanks for clearing up the issue.
